title: Profile of a quartet
creator_credit: BBC-TV, Peter Newington and Humphrey Burton
brief_description: A glimpse of the work which goes into a production of good chamber music. Introduces the members of the Quartet both at home with their families and at rehearsal together where much discussion takes place and several pieces of chamber music are played. Illustrates the focussing of the four men’s lives to produce this close teamwork.
